front.title: The Strategist
front.setup: Search the villain deck for all Condition cards; put them aside as the Condition deck. Search the villain deck for all Trap cards; shuffle them and deal H face-down. Put the other trap cards aside. Put The Simurgh into play, "The Strategist" side up.
front.gameplay:
Face-down trap cards are not in play.
At the start of the villain turn, reveal the top card of the Condition deck.
At the start of the villain turn, reveal the top two cards of the villain deck. Put them back on the villain deck ordered by their $(INSERT_SYMBOL) number

card.name: A Surfeit of Targets
card.text: When this card is revealed, if there are at least H Ongoing cards in play, flip over a face-down trap card. Then return this card to the Condition deck and shuffle it

card.name: A Reckoning Long Delayed
card.text: When this card is flipped, every player must secretly and without discussion vote for a hero by simultaneously pointing at a hero card (Count down from 3). If there is a clear winner, that hero deals itself 5 psychic damage. Otherwise, every hero deals themselves 5 psychic damage.
